scripts.dev: npm run replica && npm run deploy && npm run vite
scripts.replica: dfx stop && rm -rf .dfx icpflower-nft-canister/.dfx && dfx start --clean --background
scripts.deploy:icpflower: cd icpflower-nft-canister && dfx canister create --all && dfx deploy --mode reinstall -y --argument '(principal "aaaaa-aa")' staging && dfx canister call staging addAsset '(record {name = "privat";payload = record {ctype = "text/html"; data = vec {blob "hello world!"} } })' && dfx canister call staging initMint && cd ..
scripts.deploy:ledger: . ./set-deploy-env.zsh && dfx deploy ledger --mode reinstall -y --argument '(record {minting_account = "'$(dfx ledger account-id)'"; initial_values = vec { record { '$WALLET_ADDRESS'; record { e8s=100_000_000_000 } }; }; send_whitelist = vec {}})'
scripts.deploy: dfx canister create --all && npm run deploy:ledger && npm run deploy:icpflower
